original_title: 🦄 Newsom's @GovPressOffice Manager Izzy "CAPS GUY" Gardon: Trolling Trump, with $40 Billion in Fire Relief at Risk 💸  — The Donald
article_summary: "California Governor Newsom's social media manager, Izzy Gardon, faces backlash for a tweet towards President Trump, potentially risking $40 billion in fire relief funds."</s>
